segments.text: Yes , I would like to look at some of your products . I think what I am using now does not fit me well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have a full range of products from cosmetics to skin cleansers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you have in foundation ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our foundation is of very super quality . We only use the finest ingredients . It will moisturize your skin and it can protect your skin from UVA and UVB .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What colors do you have in foundation ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me show you . We have six colors
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The color I use now is natural beige . How much do you sell it for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What you're paying for , madam , is the ingredients . it provides a soft and perfect finish coverage with a weightless feel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand . I need a lipstick , too . Do you have lipsticks in red ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . But I suggest you buy a lipgloss . The shining effect is in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . How much is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 45 Yuan . If you buy the two , you can get a small bottle of nail polish for free .
segments.speaker: S1
